short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Nooli is a productivity tool for modern households. This extension helps you easily turn web pages into calendar events.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simply copy-paste information from anywhere - web pages, PDFs, emails, WhatsApp messages - and Nooli will respond with any calendar events we found within the text.
